issue.title: [C++] Build all benchmarks on Windows without failing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4349](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4349). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of the benchmarks fail to build on Windows. We don't build them in Appveyor so we might consider changing that, or testing them in a nightly build

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4349?focusedCommentId=16751147) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3468
